headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Applied Materials (AMAT) After A 72% One Year Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Applied Materials at around US$327 per share still offers value, you are not alone. The stock has drawn a lot of attention from investors asking if the current price fairly reflects its long term prospects. The share price has moved to US$327.01, with returns of 6.4% over the past week, 27.5% over the last 30 days, 21.6% year to date and 72.0% over the past year. Three year and five year returns sit at 194.3% and 215.8% respectively. Recent news around Applied...
